results.content: Lots of great stuff! Most of the concepts are explained completely. Some of them though are skipped over slightly so you need to pay close attention and possibly use another source to really get the details of some of the techniques used.
results.content_html: Lots of great stuff! Most of the concepts are explained completely. Some of them though are skipped over slightly so you need to pay close attention and possibly use another source to really get the details of some of the techniques used.

results.content: I really liked the course, but the publisher should mention that he is working with PHP to serve some files. If you don't know PHP then, this course will not be as effective.
results.content_html: I really liked the course, but the publisher should mention that he is working with PHP to serve some files. If you don't know PHP then, this course will not be as effective.

results.content: Nice clear easy to follow course on how AJAX works and the JQuery library functions needed to execute AJAX in your application. The instructors delivery is clear and easy to follow and the full screen video is big enough to read the code and double check you own for errors. Worth both the time, effort and money to do the course.
results.content_html: Nice clear easy to follow course on how AJAX works and the JQuery library functions needed to execute AJAX in your application. The instructors delivery is clear and easy to follow and the full screen video is big enough to read the code and double check you own for errors. Worth both the time, effort and money to do the course.

results.content: Explicaciones simples y directas, me sirvió de mucho. Algunos videos del proyecto chat tienen baja calidad.
results.content_html: Explicaciones simples y directas, me sirvió de mucho. Algunos videos del proyecto chat tienen baja calidad.

results.content: The level of detail and approach to layering the tutorials makes this a joy to follow, I would recommend it to anybody with a basic level of javascript knowledge or as a refresher to others.
results.content_html: The level of detail and approach to layering the tutorials makes this a joy to follow, I would recommend it to anybody with a basic level of javascript knowledge or as a refresher to others.

results.content: I love this course! The explanations are clear and very practical. Perfect for somebody who is not new to coding but new to Ajax and needs to grab the main concepts quickly.
results.content_html: I love this course! The explanations are clear and very practical. Perfect for somebody who is not new to coding but new to Ajax and needs to grab the main concepts quickly.

results.content: This course is truely disappointing,it was not what I expected. I was expecting more details on how to start  ajax , json, and when and why to use it  with jquery. It started out great with ajax but went south quickly. The instructor started using PHP in the examples , which I was not familiar with. So if you purchase this course, you need to have some knowledge of PHP. When he coded the examples, he kept coding so fast and saying "this will work" without going into greater detail as to why.  I wanted more as to when , where, and why, of starting and using  ajax, JSON with Jquery,  but left with this course with more questions than answers.
results.content_html: This course is truely disappointing,it was not what I expected. I was expecting more details on how to start ajax , json, and when and why to use it with jquery. It started out great with ajax but went south quickly. The instructor started using PHP in the examples , which I was not familiar with. So if you purchase this course, you need to have some knowledge of PHP. When he coded the examples, he kept coding so fast and saying "this will work" without going into greater detail as to why. I wanted more as to when , where, and why, of starting and using ajax, JSON with Jquery, but left with this course with more questions than answers.

results.content: This tutorial introduced Ajax and JSON to me in a way that I'm able to get it right away.
results.content_html: This tutorial introduced Ajax and JSON to me in a way that I'm able to get it right away.
